title: Kamala Harris to hold first rally with VP pick in crucial Philadelphia, say sources
Kamala Harris unveils $50m 'Fearless' ad campaign, targeting Trump
content: Kamala Harris launched a $50 million ad campaign with a one-minute spot titled “Fearless” after consolidating support post-Biden's withdrawal and endorsement. The campaign targets key battleground states and young voters, focusing on Donald Trump's felony convictions and anti-abortion measures, aiming to close the polling gap with her rival.
summary: Kamala Harris launched a $50 million ad campaign with a one-minute spot titled “Fearless” after consolidating support post-Biden's withdrawal and endorsement. The campaign targets key battleground states and young voters, focusing on Donald Trump's felony convictions and anti-abortion measures, aiming to close the polling gap with her rival.

Donald Trump says Kamala Harris doesn't like Jewish people, agrees her husband is 'crappy Jew'
content: ​Kamala Harris' husband Douglas Emhoff is a Jew and the first Jewish spouse of an American vice president. But Donald Trump said Kamala Harris does not like Jewish people notwithstanding the fact that she is married to one. In an interview on WABC radio Tuesday, Trump said Harris dislikes Jews and Israel more than Biden.
summary: ​Kamala Harris' husband Douglas Emhoff is a Jew and the first Jewish spouse of an American vice president. But Donald Trump said Kamala Harris does not like Jewish people notwithstanding the fact that she is married to one. In an interview on WABC radio Tuesday, Trump said Harris dislikes Jews and Israel more than Biden.

title: 'Go after Meta and Google': Trump reacts to censorship on assassination content
content: Former president Donald Trump Tuesday reacted to the reported censorship on content on the assassination bid on him by Meta and Google. Social media users pointed out that that Facebook was labeling the image of Donald Trump pumping his fist in the air after the assassination bid in Pennsylvania as an "altered photo". Meta Public Affairs director Dani Lever admitted that it was an error triggered by a separate version of the image.
summary: Former president Donald Trump Tuesday reacted to the reported censorship on content on the assassination bid on him by Meta and Google. Social media users pointed out that that Facebook was labeling the image of Donald Trump pumping his fist in the air after the assassination bid in Pennsylvania as an "altered photo". Meta Public Affairs director Dani Lever admitted that it was an error triggered by a separate version of the image.

title: 'Our last chance': Venezuelan youth weigh leaving after election result
content: University graduate Jorge Salcedo sees no future in Venezuela after President Nicolas Maduro's contested re-election. Salcedo, disheartened by alleged electoral fraud and violence between supporters, considers joining the millions who have already left the country amid its economic and political turmoil. He fears that the young generation will continue to emigrate if the regime persists.
summary: University graduate Jorge Salcedo sees no future in Venezuela after President Nicolas Maduro's contested re-election. Salcedo, disheartened by alleged electoral fraud and violence between supporters, considers joining the millions who have already left the country amid its economic and political turmoil. He fears that the young generation will continue to emigrate if the regime persists.

title: Actor 'shocked' seeing grocery store in Africa. 'I was lied to,' she says after backlash
content: Comedian Tiffany Haddish has been slammed for a viral TikTok video in which she is seen expressing shock that Africa has grocery stores. Now she has defended her viral video and said she was showing it to the world that they were taught wrong things about Africa.
summary: Comedian Tiffany Haddish has been slammed for a viral TikTok video in which she is seen expressing shock that Africa has grocery stores. Now she has defended her viral video and said she was showing it to the world that they were taught wrong things about Africa.

title: How El Chapo's son helped US capture 'last godfather' of Sinaloa drug cartel
content: Ismael Zambada Garcia, a top figure in Mexico's Sinaloa cartel, was captured after being lured into a meeting by Joaquin Guzman Lopez, son of El Chapo. Guzman Lopez allegedly abducted him, leading to a clash between their bodyguards. US authorities were not involved in the covert operation but later apprehended Garcia upon his arrival in the US.
summary: Ismael Zambada Garcia, a top figure in Mexico's Sinaloa cartel, was captured after being lured into a meeting by Joaquin Guzman Lopez, son of El Chapo. Guzman Lopez allegedly abducted him, leading to a clash between their bodyguards. US authorities were not involved in the covert operation but later apprehended Garcia upon his arrival in the US.

title: 'BRAT' meme fest puts Kamala in lime-light
content: Kamala Harris's unexpected run for US president sparked a surge of memes centered on Charli XCX's new album, BRAT. The campaign, infused with the album's lime green aesthetic, quickly gained popularity after Charli XCX declared 'Kamala IS brat.

title: When JD Vance wrote he felt more like a female
content: ​Ohio senator and Donald Trump's running mate JD Vance has one after another firefighting to do as there's no end to the skeletons tumbling out of the closet. First the rumor that he had sex with a couch, then his Mountain Dew comment followed by resurfacing of his past 'childless cat ladies' comment, then his email exchange with a friend where he slammed Trump and now his Venmo account which was left public and now his digital footprints lead us back to some weird blogs.

title: Has Kamala Harris decided on US vice presidential running mate?
Turkish President Erdogan could end up like Saddam Hussein: Israel
content: Israeli Foreign Minister Israel Katz warned Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan about facing a fate similar to Saddam Hussein if he intervened in the Gaza conflict. Erdogan suggested Turkey could enter Israel to aid Palestinians, drawing criticism from Katz and Israeli opposition leader Yair Lapid. The international community is closely monitoring the escalating tensions between Israel and Turkey.
summary: Israeli Foreign Minister Israel Katz warned Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan about facing a fate similar to Saddam Hussein if he intervened in the Gaza conflict. Erdogan suggested Turkey could enter Israel to aid Palestinians, drawing criticism from Katz and Israeli opposition leader Yair Lapid. The international community is closely monitoring the escalating tensions between Israel and Turkey.
